SAVE_FILE - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.File_Handler
This field represents the name of the save file for the GameObjects
SAVE_GRID_CLASS - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.File_Handler
This field represents the name of the file for the Grid object
SAVE_PLAYER - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.File_Handler
This field represents the name of the save file for the {link Player} object.
savedGrid - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.File_Handler
This field represents a Grid object in its state from the time that "save" is selected by the user in the GameEngine.setOption() method.
saveFile(Grid, Player) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.File_Handler
This method saves Grid.gog, Grid, and Player into three separate files named "save.obj", "save.grid", and "save.plr" respectively.

This method randomly places the briefcase by calling roll().

This method will set the userChoice to whatever String is passed to it.
setDebug() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameEngine
This method is called when debug is selected from the options menus.
setEnemy() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Grid
This method randomly places 6 enemies on the Grid at least two squares away from the Player
setHasShield(boolean) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Player
This method will set Player.hasShield to whatever boolean is passed in as a parameter

setM(int) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Player
This method will set Player.m to whatever int is passed in as a parameter
setObjectName(String) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameObject
This method changes GameObject.objName to the name given by the object type.
setObjId(int) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameObject
This method will set the GameObject.objId to the int passed to it and then returns that ID to whatever called it.
setOption() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameEngine
This method deals with input received after it calls UserInterface.options().
setPowerUps() - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Grid
This method calls the methods that spawn each individual power up.

This method changes GameObject.realName to the name given by the object type.

This method essentially populates the Grid for a new game.

This method will change Enemy.xPosition to whatever int is passed in as a parameter.
setXY(int, int) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameObject
This method changes the coordinates of the GameObject to whatever the integers passed to it declare.
setYPosition(int) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Enemy

This field instantiates Shield
Shield - Class in edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse
This class represents the shield object, it will protect the Player from being stabbed by an Enemy for a set number of turns.

This field represents an int[] containing the coordinates of the Shield
shieldVis - Variable in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Grid
This field represents a boolean that is true when the location of the Shield can be seen, and false otherwise

showObjectsWithinLocation(int, int, int, int, boolean) - Method in class edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Grid
This method will show the objects in a specific location so long as the boolean parameter is true; otherwise it serves to hide the object at that specific location.
